  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La Hidrosfera como reguladora de la temperatura del Planeta</string>
            <string language="en">The hydrosphere as the planet's temperature regulator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Hydrosphere als der Temperaturregler des 
Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'hydrosphère comme régulateur de la 
température de la planète</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O hydrosphere como o regulador da temperatura do 
planeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il hydrosphere come il regolatore di temperatura 
del pianeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η υδρόσφαιρα ως ρυθμιστή θερμοκρασίας του πλανήτη</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica el mecanismo para la regulación de la temperatura por la capacidad que posee el agua para absorber, transportar y desprender energía.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the temperature regulating mechanism by means of the capacity of water to absorb, transport and give off energy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Hidrosfera</string>
            <string language="en">Hydrosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die regelnde Einheit der 
Temperatur mittels der Kapazität des Wassers, Energie aufzusaugen, zu
transportieren und abzugeben erklärt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant le mécanisme de régulation de 
la température au moyen de la capacité de l'eau d'absorber, 
transporter et dégager l'énergie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica o mecanismo regulando da 
temperatura por meio da capacidade da água absorver, transportar e 
dar fora da energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega il meccanismo regolante di 
temperatura per mezzo della capacità di acqua di assorbire, 
trasportare ed emanare energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί το ρυθμίζοντας μηχανισμό θερμοκρασίας
με τη βοήθεια της ικανότητας του ύδατος που απορροφά, που 
μεταφέρει και που εκπέμπει την ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hydrosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hydrosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hydrosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hydrosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υδρόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
